name: Steam Compact
tagline: A skin for the Steam client
body:
### General Information
This is the only place where I make my skin available. Any mirrors or copies found elsewhere are not endorsed by me.

If you like to live on the edge I might sometimes have a dev branch going for any Steam beta development. This is only when I have the time and inclination for it though. I will always post what Steam version my skin is compatible with, so please check that before reporting any issues.

### Installation instructions and advice
The directory structure in the .zip file lets you quite quickly figure out where to extract the contents. 

I _strongly_ advise you to disable DirectWrite font smoothing in **Settings â€º Interface** when using
this skin, since these small font sizes aren't even remotely suitable for DirectWrite.

**Linux** users: Read the included readme for instructions how to install this skin on Linux. 
A few issues with fonts requires some manual work. Please let me know if you experience any issues with this, I haven't tested it much myself

### Information about current version  (updated August 29, 2015)
Version 1.5.58 is compatible with Steam version **1440016726, August 19 2015**

Changes since previous version include:
* Updated to match Steam version 1440016726 (built 150819)
* Adjustments to the Downloads window
* Adjustments to the Details window
* Fixed a few inconsistencies for Polish language users

### Support or Contact
Having any issues? Either report it here or in the [Steam Community Group](http://steamcommunity.com/groups/SteamCompact).
